Text: The Princeton Review Enron GMAT courseYour GMAT class will be held in ECN which is in the old Enron building The first meeting will be held from PM but the others will be from PM If you have any questions please call John Lewis Director of Course Operations The Princeton Review Houston

The Princeton Review Enron GMAT ClassesDear Enron GMAT students Due to the current circumstances we will be moving all of our current Enron GMAT classes from the Enron building to our main office location The schedules will remain the same but your class will now be meeting at North Post Oak Road Suite If you have any other questions please give us a call We hope the best for your future The Princeton Review
